String Cosmo Documentation
=====================

You can find the repository in  `Github <https://github.com/PanoPepino/string_cosmo_communication>`_.

.. note::

   This is a personal package under construction. New features and a more optimised organisation will come. In case you find some and/or have some suggestions, please
   report at `github issues <https://github.com/PanoPepino/beanim/issues>`_.
